item.title: The names of stones
item.summary: A list of the |xam and proper names of stones and gemstones, given by Dia!kwain at the Philadelphia Exhibition. The Bushman names for a few Stones were given by Díä!kwãin (L V.-20. 5574 and 5575), and by lhan≠kass’o (L VIII.-21. 7818, 7834).
item.comments: 1) Date on p.5573v: pages taken down at the Philadelphia Exhibition (on 29 November 1875 with Dia!kwain), 2) pp.5573v-5574v: see Parts of the ostrich not to be eaten by children, 3) This story is found in Book V-20
item.author: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
